title: Introduction to C Programming
para: Explore foundational programming with 'Introduction to C Programming' or algorithmic thinking in 'Problem-Solving Part'.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
para: Gain practical problem-solving skills in 'Introduction to Algorithms' or deepen understanding of OOP with 'Introduction to OOP Python'.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
para: Discover the power of C++ in 'Introduction to C++ for DSA' or delve into Software Engineering principles.

title: Basic Data Structures
para: Learn MySQL database management in 'Database (MySQL)' or enter the world of AWS in 'AWS, Cloud Computing'.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
para: Master fundamental data structures in 'Basic Data Structures' or elevate software development skills in 'Software Engineering'.

title: Software Engineering
para: Master software development principles and methodologies in 'Software Engineering'.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
para: Explore cloud computing with a focus on AWS in 'AWS, Cloud Computing'.

title: Database (MySQL)
para: Learn relational database management with MySQL in 'Database (MySQL)'.

title: Problem-Solving Part
para: Enhance problem-solving skills with algorithmic thinking in 'Problem-Solving Part'.
